text.content:
Winded

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued}.

Melee

Bad Alignment

You take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls with this weapon]{-2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls with this weapon} until the end of your next turn.

Ranged

It bit your Fist

The target deals jaws damage to you.

Unarmed

Poor Trade

You hit, but you lose a prepared spell or spell slot of the highest level available (you choose the spell).

Spell
